data_table.description: Physical Exam Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PEX1
variable.description: Lung Sounds. Q1. Number of lung sounds [Physical Exam Form]

variable.name: PEX1A
variable.description: Lung Sounds. Q1a. Lung sound fewer than 4 areas were recorded, specify. Reason [Physical Exam Form]

variable.name: PEX2
variable.description: Lower Extremity Edema. Q2. Right ankle/leg edema [Physical Exam Form]

variable.name: PEX2A
variable.description: Lower Extremity Edema. Q2a. No right edema reason [Physical Exam Form]

variable.name: PEX3
variable.description: Lower Extremity Edema. Q3. Left ankle/leg edema [Physical Exam Form]

variable.name: PEX3A
variable.description: Lower Extremity Edema. Q3a. No left edema reason [Physical Exam Form]

variable.name: PEX0AY
variable.description: Q0a. Year of completion date [Physical Exam Form]
